content.value_statement: Build distinctive web interfaces that stand out from generic AI-generated aesthetics. Create memorable, visually striking components with careful attention to typography, motion, and spatial composition.
actual_capabilities: Create distinctive frontend components and pages with bold aesthetic direction
Implement production-grade HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and framework code
Design with typography-focused approach using unique font choices
Apply motion design with CSS animations and interactive micro-interactions
Build spatially complex layouts with asymmetry and unexpected compositions
limitations: Does not provide pre-built component libraries or templates
Does not access design files or assets from external sources
Does not perform accessibility testing or validation
Does not integrate with design tools like Figma or Sketch

use_cases.title: Build memorable web interfaces
use_cases.description: Create production-ready components with distinctive visual identity and polished animations

use_cases.title: Transform designs to code
use_cases.description: Translate creative vision into working frontend code with precise aesthetic execution

use_cases.title: Rapid interface prototyping
use_cases.description: Generate creative, on-brand interface concepts that avoid generic design patterns

prompt_templates.title: Component Request
prompt_templates.prompt: Create a [component type] for [purpose]. The audience is [description]. Use a [aesthetic] aesthetic with [color theme] colors.

prompt_templates.title: Full Page Design
prompt_templates.prompt: Design a complete [page type] page for [use case]. Commit to a bold [aesthetic direction] visual style with unexpected layout choices.

prompt_templates.title: Animation Focus
prompt_templates.prompt: Build an interactive [component] with emphasis on motion design. Use staggered animations on load, scroll-triggered effects, and surprising hover states.

prompt_templates.title: Minimalist Design
prompt_templates.prompt: Create a [component] with refined minimalism. Focus on typography, negative space, precise spacing, and subtle details that convey elegance through restraint.

output_examples.input: Create a navigation component for a creative agency website with a brutalist aesthetic
output: Navigation component with bold typography, sharp contrast, and unconventional layout
CSS custom properties for consistent brutalist color palette
Hover states with unexpected color inversions and scale shifts
Mobile-responsive breakdown with distinctive hamburger menu animation

output_examples.input: Design a landing page for a fintech startup with an art deco geometric aesthetic
output: Landing page with gold and black color scheme and art deco typography
Geometric patterns and decorative borders throughout layout
Staggered entrance animations on scroll with refined easing
Responsive grid that maintains geometric integrity on mobile

output_examples.input: Build a product card for a boutique shop with organic natural aesthetic
output: Product card with soft color palette and organic shape variations
Texture overlays and grain effects for natural feel
Subtle hover animations with scale and shadow play
Typography pairing of display serif with clean sans-serif body

best_practices: Commit to a specific aesthetic direction before coding rather than defaulting to generic choices
Use distinctive font pairings that elevate the design beyond standard system fonts
Focus on high-impact motion moments rather than scattered micro-interactions
Apply CSS variables for theming and maintain consistent design token usage
anti_patterns: Using generic fonts like Arial, Inter, or Roboto without intentional design rationale
Applying purple gradients on white backgrounds as default styling
Creating predictable, symmetric layouts without visual interest
Generating cookie-cutter components that lack context-specific character

faq.question: Which frontend frameworks does this skill support?
faq.answer: Works with any frontend framework including React, Vue, Svelte, vanilla HTML/CSS/JS, and component libraries.

faq.question: What complexity levels can this skill handle?
faq.answer: From simple single components to complete page applications. Complexity matches the design vision provided.

faq.question: How does this skill integrate with my codebase?
faq.answer: The skill generates code snippets that integrate into existing projects through the AI assistant context.

faq.question: Is my code or data accessed during generation?
faq.answer: No. This is a prompt-only skill that provides design guidance without accessing files or external systems.

faq.question: Why do my designs look different from standard AI outputs?
faq.answer: The skill explicitly avoids generic AI aesthetics in favor of bold, distinctive, context-appropriate design choices.

faq.question: How is this different from using a UI component library?
faq.answer: Generates custom, one-of-a-kind designs rather than library components. Focus is on creative differentiation.
